Articles.Content:
This a thread where you can help others with small things, that aren't too big or difficult. Or ask help of course.

I have a choice to make:

Lego Saturn V or new Laptop? I have 7-8 months before my birthday and a little less than 12 months till Christmas so its not desperate but wich one should i get first?

Edited January 2, 2018 by NSEP

I would personally go for the computer. Mostly because I'd have nowhere to put the Saturn V.

Though a computer would be more expensive....

Hm

EDIT: I just noticed the Saturn V has 1969 parts That's so cool lol

Edited January 2, 2018 by Earthlinger

The Saturn V has a ton of detail - even the internal structures within the stages tend to have two cylindrical segments like fuel tanks! All the stages separate and the lander fits in the interstage. You can dock the CSM and LEM. The only thing inconsistent I noticed was the color of the fire pieces on the second and third stage engines - they were orange instead of blue. An easy fix for someone with lots of Lego pieces around.

It's a really good set, very sturdy too.
Laptop is more practical. Saturn V is nicer to play with, unless your laptop is a super nice 1080 ti graphics card and a i7-7500
